caption.title: Global comparison of inter-model differences for three 2 K intervals.
caption.p: Maps show comparisons between ( a), the two routes to a first 2 K (as left column of Fig. 3); and ( b), the second 2 K and 2 K (Fast)—as right column of Fig. 3. Values are Pearson correlation coefficients (squared, for variance explained) between the vector of 25 model results for one 2 K interval and the equivalent vector for the second 2 K interval. ( c) panel b/panel a. Regions marked in white in c correspond to those used in Fig. 3.
